meanings.definition: In a generous or lavish manner.
meanings.sent1: She donated munificently to the charity event.
meanings.sent2: The millionaire gave munificently to those in need.
meanings.sent3: The magician pulled a rabbit out of his hat munificently.
meanings.sent4: The sun shone munificently on the blooming flowers.
meanings.sent5: The chef sprinkled spices munificently over the dish.

meanings.sent1: The munificently wealthy man built a school for the community.
meanings.sent2: Her munificently nature endeared her to everyone she met.
meanings.sent3: The munificently decorated house was the talk of the town.
meanings.sent4: His munificently heart knew no bounds.
meanings.sent5: The munificently gift-wrapped present sparkled under the tree.
